short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds right click 'open as popup' option

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Simple addition to the right click context menu while on a web-page to open the current page in a pop up window.

There's also an icon on the top right when clicked also opens the tab in a new window as a popup (no address bar, tabs, or bookmarks bar)

I had more help making this than i'd like to admit, so i'd just like to say thanks to those who did help.

Enjoy!
